channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Norfolk Southern fires CEO over inappropriate workplace relationship
item.description: Shaw was terminated for cause, effective immediately, after the railroad found he violated company policies.

item.title: Biden administration did not fast-track student loan relief before final rule, official says
item.description: The Biden administration three times has sought to forgive federal student debt only to see courts block those efforts after Republican-led challenges...

item.title: 15 companies that have rewarded long-term shareholders with high dividend income
GOP strategist says Trump’s false pet-eating claims at debate only hurt him
item.description: “At best, it’s a distraction,” GOP strategist to Conant said. “At worst, it reminds people of the all the craziness that comes with Trump.”

item.title: Bitcoin could soon hit six figures regardless of who wins U.S. election, investors say
item.description: Despite the increasingly partisan sentiment in the crypto industry, bitcoin will thrive regardless of who wins the U.S. presidential election in Novem...

item.title: Opinion: AI-powered stock ETFs were hyped as superior bets. Then reality hit.
Sanders vows contempt if CEO refuses to answer on getting ‘fabulously wealthy’ while hospitals went bankrupt
item.description: “[H]e doesn’t want to explain to the American people how horrific his greed has become," Sanders said. “Tell me about your yacht."

item.title: Financials have been on fire lately. These stocks are expected to fly higher from here
item.description: These financial stocks can run even further from here after the sector's breakout year.

item.title: Norfolk Southern fires its CEO over relationship with another executive
Canned food identified as cause of explosion that injured 6 at state fair
item.description: Authorities said two people were hospitalized after the explosion and fire.

item.title: Norfolk Southern board probe focusing on CEO's relationship with chief legal officer
item.description: The focus on Nabanita Nag, the chief legal officer at the railroad, has not been reported, and comes as CEO Alan Shaw is expected to resign.

item.title: Job market is getting tougher, but workers may be gaining in remote-work battle
Harris and Trump’s facial expressions stole the debate
item.description: With their microphones muted unless it was their turn to speak, according to the debate rules, body language took on outsized importance for Harris an...

item.title: Restaurant chain BurgerFi files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection
item.description: In its latest quarter, same-store sales at BurgerFi's namesake chain tumbled 13%.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang addresses the big question on investors’ minds
